desc_content.paragraph: Undocumented contribute <https://developer.blender.org/T51061>

field_body.paragraph: swap (enum in ['A_B', 'B_C', 'A_C'], (optional)) – Swap, The effect inputs to swap

desc_content.paragraph: Undocumented contribute <https://developer.blender.org/T51061>

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['CROSS', 'ADD', 'SUBTRACT', 'ALPHA_OVER', 'ALPHA_UNDER', 'GAMMA_CROSS', 'MULTIPLY', 'OVER_DROP', 'WIPE', 'GLOW', 'TRANSFORM', 'COLOR', 'SPEED', 'MULTICAM', 'ADJUSTMENT', 'GAUSSIAN_BLUR', 'TEXT', 'COLORMIX'], (optional)) – Type, Sequencer effect typeCROSS Crossfade, Crossfade effect strip type.ADD Add, Add effect strip type.SUBTRACT Subtract, Subtract effect strip type.ALPHA_OVER Alpha Over, Alpha Over effect strip type.ALPHA_UNDER Alpha Under, Alpha Under effect strip type.GAMMA_CROSS Gamma Cross, Gamma Cross effect strip type.MULTIPLY Multiply, Multiply effect strip type.OVER_DROP Alpha Over Drop, Alpha Over Drop effect strip type.WIPE Wipe, Wipe effect strip type.GLOW Glow, Glow effect strip type.TRANSFORM Transform, Transform effect strip type.COLOR Color, Color effect strip type.SPEED Speed, Color effect strip type.MULTICAM Multicam Selector.ADJUSTMENT Adjustment Layer.GAUSSIAN_BLUR Gaussian Blur.TEXT Text.COLORMIX Color Mix.

desc_content.paragraph: Undocumented contribute <https://developer.blender.org/T51061>

list_item.paragraph: filepath (string, (optional, never None)) – File Path, Path to file
directory (string, (optional, never None)) – Directory, Directory of the file
filemode (int in [1, 9], (optional)) – File Browser Mode, The setting for the file browser mode to load a .blend file, a library or a special file
relative_path (boolean, (optional)) – Relative Path, Select the file relative to the blend file

display_type (enum in ['DEFAULT', 'LIST_SHORT', 'LIST_LONG', 'THUMBNAIL'], (optional)) – Display TypeDEFAULT Default, Automatically determine display type for files.LIST_SHORT Short List, Display files as short list.LIST_LONG Long List, Display files as a detailed list.THUMBNAIL Thumbnails, Display files as thumbnails.

sort_method (enum in ['FILE_SORT_ALPHA', 'FILE_SORT_EXTENSION', 'FILE_SORT_TIME', 'FILE_SORT_SIZE'], (optional)) – File sorting modeFILE_SORT_ALPHA Sort alphabetically, Sort the file list alphabetically.FILE_SORT_EXTENSION Sort by extension, Sort the file list by extension/type.FILE_SORT_TIME Sort by time, Sort files by modification time.FILE_SORT_SIZE Sort by size, Sort files by size.
use_placeholders (boolean, (optional)) – Use Placeholders, Use placeholders for missing frames of the strip

desc_content.paragraph: Undocumented contribute <https://developer.blender.org/T51061>
Do cross-fading volume animation of two selected sound strips
Cut the selected strips

list_item.paragraph: frame (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Frame, Frame where selected strips will be cut
type (enum in ['SOFT', 'HARD'], (optional)) – Type, The type of cut operation to perform on strips
side (enum in ['MOUSE', 'LEFT', 'RIGHT', 'BOTH'], (optional)) – Side, The side that remains selected after cutting

desc_content.paragraph: Cut multi-cam strip and select camera

field_body.paragraph: camera (int in [1, 32], (optional)) – Camera

desc_content.paragraph: Deinterlace all selected movie sources
Erase selected strips from the sequencer
Duplicate the selected strips

field_body.paragraph: mode (enum in ['INIT', 'DUMMY', 'TRANSLATION', 'ROTATION', 'RESIZE', 'SKIN_RESIZE', 'TOSPHERE', 'SHEAR', 'BEND', 'SHRINKFATTEN', 'TILT', 'TRACKBALL', 'PUSHPULL', 'CREASE', 'MIRROR', 'BONE_SIZE', 'BONE_ENVELOPE', 'BONE_ENVELOPE_DIST', 'CURVE_SHRINKFATTEN', 'MASK_SHRINKFATTEN', 'GPENCIL_SHRINKFATTEN', 'BONE_ROLL', 'TIME_TRANSLATE', 'TIME_SLIDE', 'TIME_SCALE', 'TIME_EXTEND', 'BAKE_TIME', 'BWEIGHT', 'ALIGN', 'EDGESLIDE', 'SEQSLIDE'], (optional)) – Mode

desc_content.paragraph: Duplicate selected strips and move them

list_item.paragraph: SEQUENCER_OT_duplicate (SEQUENCER_OT_duplicate, (optional)) – Duplicate Strips, Duplicate the selected strips
TRANSFORM_OT_seq_slide (TRANSFORM_OT_seq_slide, (optional)) – Sequence Slide, Slide a sequence strip in time

desc_content.paragraph: Add an effect to the sequencer, most are applied on top of existing strips

list_item.paragraph: frame_start (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Start Frame, Start frame of the sequence strip
frame_end (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – End Frame, End frame for the color strip
channel (int in [1, 32], (optional)) – Channel, Channel to place this strip into
replace_sel (boolean, (optional)) – Replace Selection, Replace the current selection
overlap (boolean, (optional)) – Allow Overlap, Don’t correct overlap on new sequence strips

type (enum in ['CROSS', 'ADD', 'SUBTRACT', 'ALPHA_OVER', 'ALPHA_UNDER', 'GAMMA_CROSS', 'MULTIPLY', 'OVER_DROP', 'WIPE', 'GLOW', 'TRANSFORM', 'COLOR', 'SPEED', 'MULTICAM', 'ADJUSTMENT', 'GAUSSIAN_BLUR', 'TEXT', 'COLORMIX'], (optional)) – Type, Sequencer effect typeCROSS Crossfade, Crossfade effect strip type.ADD Add, Add effect strip type.SUBTRACT Subtract, Subtract effect strip type.ALPHA_OVER Alpha Over, Alpha Over effect strip type.ALPHA_UNDER Alpha Under, Alpha Under effect strip type.GAMMA_CROSS Gamma Cross, Gamma Cross effect strip type.MULTIPLY Multiply, Multiply effect strip type.OVER_DROP Alpha Over Drop, Alpha Over Drop effect strip type.WIPE Wipe, Wipe effect strip type.GLOW Glow, Glow effect strip type.TRANSFORM Transform, Transform effect strip type.COLOR Color, Color effect strip type.SPEED Speed, Color effect strip type.MULTICAM Multicam Selector.ADJUSTMENT Adjustment Layer.GAUSSIAN_BLUR Gaussian Blur.TEXT Text.COLORMIX Color Mix.
color (float array of 3 items in [0, 1], (optional)) – Color, Initialize the strip with this color (only used when type=’COLOR’)

desc_content.paragraph: Enable selected proxies on all selected Movie strips
Export .srt file containing text strips

list_item.paragraph: filepath (string, (optional, never None)) – File Path, Path to file
check_existing (boolean, (optional)) – Check Existing, Check and warn on overwriting existing files
filemode (int in [1, 9], (optional)) – File Browser Mode, The setting for the file browser mode to load a .blend file, a library or a special file

display_type (enum in ['DEFAULT', 'LIST_SHORT', 'LIST_LONG', 'THUMBNAIL'], (optional)) – Display TypeDEFAULT Default, Automatically determine display type for files.LIST_SHORT Short List, Display files as short list.LIST_LONG Long List, Display files as a detailed list.THUMBNAIL Thumbnails, Display files as thumbnails.

sort_method (enum in ['FILE_SORT_ALPHA', 'FILE_SORT_EXTENSION', 'FILE_SORT_TIME', 'FILE_SORT_SIZE'], (optional)) – File sorting modeFILE_SORT_ALPHA Sort alphabetically, Sort the file list alphabetically.FILE_SORT_EXTENSION Sort by extension, Sort the file list by extension/type.FILE_SORT_TIME Sort by time, Sort files by modification time.FILE_SORT_SIZE Sort by size, Sort files by size.

desc_content.paragraph: Insert gap at current frame to first strips at the right, independent of selection or locked state of strips

field_body.paragraph: frames (int in [0, inf], (optional)) – Frames, Frames to insert after current strip

desc_content.paragraph: Remove gap at current frame to first strip at the right, independent of selection or locked state of strips

field_body.paragraph: all (boolean, (optional)) – All Gaps, Do all gaps to right of current frame

Reload strips in the sequencer

desc_content.paragraph: Set render size and aspect from active sequence
Use mouse to sample color in current frame
Add a strip to the sequencer using a blender scene as a source

list_item.paragraph: frame_start (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Start Frame, Start frame of the sequence strip
channel (int in [1, 32], (optional)) – Channel, Channel to place this strip into
replace_sel (boolean, (optional)) – Replace Selection, Replace the current selection
overlap (boolean, (optional)) – Allow Overlap, Don’t correct overlap on new sequence strips

desc_content.paragraph: Select a strip (last selected becomes the “active strip”)

list_item.paragraph: linked_handle (boolean, (optional)) – Linked Handle, Select handles next to the active strip

left_right (enum in ['NONE', 'MOUSE', 'LEFT', 'RIGHT'], (optional)) – Left/Right, Select based on the current frame side the cursor is onNONE None, Don’t do left-right selection.MOUSE Mouse, Use mouse position for selection.LEFT Left, Select left.RIGHT Right, Select right.
linked_time (boolean, (optional)) – Linked Time, Select other strips at the same time

desc_content.paragraph: Select strips on the nominated side of the active strip

field_body.paragraph: side (enum in ['MOUSE', 'LEFT', 'RIGHT', 'BOTH'], (optional)) – Side, The side of the handle that is selected

desc_content.paragraph: Select or deselect all strips

field_body.paragraph: action (enum in ['TOGGLE', 'SELECT', 'DESELECT', 'INVERT'], (optional)) – Action, Selection action to executeTOGGLE Toggle, Toggle selection for all elements.SELECT Select, Select all elements.DESELECT Deselect, Deselect all elements.INVERT Invert, Invert selection of all elements.

desc_content.paragraph: Select strips using box selection

list_item.paragraph: deselect (boolean, (optional)) – Deselect, Deselect rather than select items
extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first

desc_content.paragraph: Select all strips grouped by various properties

list_item.paragraph: type (enum in ['TYPE', 'TYPE_BASIC', 'TYPE_EFFECT', 'DATA', 'EFFECT', 'EFFECT_LINK', 'OVERLAP'], (optional)) – TypeTYPE Type, Shared strip type.TYPE_BASIC Global Type, All strips of same basic type (Graphical or Sound).TYPE_EFFECT Effect Type, Shared strip effect type (if active strip is not an effect one, select all non-effect strips).DATA Data, Shared data (scene, image, sound, etc.).EFFECT Effect, Shared effects.EFFECT_LINK Effect/Linked, Other strips affected by the active one (sharing some time, and below or effect-assigned).OVERLAP Overlap, Overlapping time.
extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend selection instead of deselecting everything first
use_active_channel (boolean, (optional)) – Same Channel, Only consider strips on the same channel as the active one

desc_content.paragraph: Select gizmo handles on the sides of the selected strip

field_body.paragraph: side (enum in ['MOUSE', 'LEFT', 'RIGHT', 'BOTH'], (optional)) – Side, The side of the handle that is selected

desc_content.paragraph: Shrink the current selection of adjacent selected strips
Select all strips adjacent to the current selection
Select a chain of linked strips nearest to the mouse pointer

field_body.paragraph: extend (boolean, (optional)) – Extend, Extend the selection

desc_content.paragraph: Select more strips adjacent to the current selection
Trim the contents of the active strip

field_body.paragraph: offset (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Offset, Offset to the data of the strip

desc_content.paragraph: Frame where selected strips will be snapped

field_body.paragraph: frame (int in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Frame, Frame where selected strips will be snapped

desc_content.paragraph: Copy modifiers of the active strip to all selected strips

field_body.paragraph: type (enum in ['REPLACE', 'APPEND'], (optional)) – TypeREPLACE Replace, Replace modifiers in destination.APPEND Append, Append active modifiers to selected strips.

desc_content.paragraph: Move modifier up and down in the stack

list_item.paragraph: name (string, (optional, never None)) – Name, Name of modifier to remove
direction (enum in ['UP', 'DOWN'], (optional)) – TypeUP Up, Move modifier up in the stack.DOWN Down, Move modifier down in the stack.

desc_content.paragraph: Remove a modifier from the strip

field_body.paragraph: name (string, (optional, never None)) – Name, Name of modifier to remove

desc_content.paragraph: Swap active strip with strip to the right or left

Zoom preview to fit in the area
Reset viewable area to show range around current frame
Set the boundaries of the border used for offset-view
Zoom the sequencer on the selected strips
Toggle between sequencer views (sequence, preview, both)
Change zoom ratio of sequencer preview

field_body.paragraph: ratio (float in [-inf, inf], (optional)) – Ratio, Zoom ratio, 1.0 is 1:1, higher is zoomed in, lower is zoomed out
